0.text: Innate: Tryndamere generates  5 Fury on his basic attacks, and 10 Fury on  critical strikes and each time he kills an enemy. After 8 seconds without dealing or taking damage, Tryndamere loses 5 Fury per second.
0.html: Innate: Tryndamere generates 5 Fury on his basic attacks, and 10 Fury on critical strikes and each time he kills an enemy. After 8 seconds without dealing or taking damage, Tryndamere loses 5 Fury per second.
markedPassages: 5 Fury
critical strikes

1.text: Tryndamere gains  0% − 40% (based on Fury) critical strike chance.
1.html: Tryndamere gains  0% − 40% (based on Fury) critical strike chance.
markedPassages: 0% − 40% (based on Fury) critical strike chance
0% − 40% (based on Fury) critical strike chance

0.text: Passive: Tryndamere gains  bonus attack damage, plus an additional amount based on his missing health.
0.html: Passive: Tryndamere gains  bonus attack damage, plus an additional amount based on his missing health.
markedPassages: bonus attack damage

1.text: Active: Tryndamere consumes all of his  Fury to  heal himself, increased for every point of Fury consumed.
1.html: Active: Tryndamere consumes all of his Fury to heal himself, increased for every point of Fury consumed.
markedPassages: Fury
heal

0.text: Active: Tryndamere reduces the  attack damage of nearby enemy champions for 4 seconds.
0.html: Active: Tryndamere reduces the  attack damage of nearby enemy champions for 4 seconds.
markedPassages: attack damage

1.text: Targets facing in the opposite direction of Tryndamere are also  slowed for the duration.
1.html: Targets facing in the opposite direction of Tryndamere are also slowed for the duration.
markedPassages: slowed

2.text: A nearby enemy champion is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be  visible to be targeted by this ability.
2.html: A nearby enemy champion is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be visible to be targeted by this ability.
markedPassages: visible
possibleConcerningAbilities: A nearby enemy champion is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be  visible to be targeted by this ability.

0.text: Active: Tryndamere  dashes to the target location, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and generating  2 Fury per enemy hit.
0.html: Active: Tryndamere dashes to the target location, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and generating 2 Fury per enemy hit.
markedPassages: dashes
2 Fury

1.text: Critical strikes reduce Spinning Slash's  current cooldown by 0.75 seconds, doubled to 1.5 seconds against  champions.
1.html: Critical strikes reduce Spinning Slash's  current cooldown by 0.75 seconds, doubled to 1.5 seconds against champions.
markedPassages: Critical strikes
current cooldown
champions

2.text: Bloodlust and  Undying Rage can be cast during the dash. Spinning Slash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Bloodlust and Undying Rage can be cast during the dash. Spinning Slash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
markedPassages: Bloodlust
Undying Rage
possibleConcerningAbilities: Bloodlust and  Undying Rage can be cast during the dash. Spinning Slash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Tryndamere becomes enraged, instantly gaining  Fury and a  minimum health threshold for 5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Tryndamere becomes enraged, instantly gaining Fury and a minimum health threshold for 5 seconds.

minimum health threshold

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 health
+6 health per 5 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Endure: After taking damage from a champion or large monster, gain health regeneration equal to 0 − 40 (based on current missing health) health over 8 seconds. Reduced to「 66% effectiveness 」「 0 − 26.4 (based on current missing health) 」 on ranged champions or when triggered by area of effect, damage over time, or proc.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

Keywords

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 4 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 120 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 4 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 120 health.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • red

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 attack damage
+20% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Cloudburst: Dash to the target location, though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the most wounded enemy within 750 units of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals 60 − 105 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) magic damage, for a total of 180 − 315 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD), increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health) (110 second cooldown; 200 - 425 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CLOUDBURST:  Dash to the target location, though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the most wounded enemy within  750 units of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals 60 − 105 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) magic damage, for a total of 180 − 315 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD), increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health) (110 second cooldown; 200 - 425 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2% bonus movement speed.
passive.originText: MYTHIC PASSIVE: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2% bonus movement speed.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+20% critical strike chance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Transcendence: If you have at least 40% critical strike chance, basic attacks on-attack reduce your basic abilities' current cooldowns by 15% of their remaining cooldowns.
Unique – Impermanence: Your ability damage and proc damage dealt by abilities is increased by 0% − 20% (based on critical strike chance).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRANSCENDENCE: If you have at least 40% critical strike chance, basic attacks on-attack reduce your basic abilities' current cooldowns by 15% of their remaining cooldowns.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  825

Keywords

  • crit shojin

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 attack damage
+25% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance
+7% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spectral Waltz: Basic attacks on-attack grant ghosting, 7% bonus movement speed, and a stack of Spectral Waltz for 3 seconds, up to 4 stacks. While at 4 stacks, gain 30% bonus attack speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPECTRAL WALTZ: Basic attacks on-attack grant  ghosting, 7% bonus movement speed, and a stack of Spectral Waltz for 3 seconds, up to 4 stacks. While at 4 stacks, gain 30% bonus attack speed.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+30 attack damage
+15% attack speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Precision: Basic attacks deal 20 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions and monsters.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – PRECISION: Basic attacks deal 20 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions and monsters.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  300

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+25% attack speed
+8% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Mist's Edge: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage on-hit equal to ( 12% / 9%) of the target's current health, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.
Unique – Siphon: Basic attacks on-hit against enemy champions apply a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to deal 40 − 103 (based on level) bonus magic damage on-hit and slow the target by 25% for 2 seconds, while also granting you 25% bonus movement speed for the same duration (30 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MIST'S EDGE: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage on-hit equal to ( 12% /  9%) of the target's current health, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.

+30% armor penetration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bitter Cold: Dealing ability damage slows affected units by 30% for 1 second.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BITTER COLD: Dealing ability damage  slows affected units by 30% for 1 second.

1.originHTML: +  +  650

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+65 attack damage
+25 ability haste
+10% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Cleave: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage from abilities deal ( 40% AD / 20% AD) physical damage to other enemies within 350 units of the target damaged. Can only hit each target once per attack or ability, and may only trigger once every 10 seconds from the same cast.
Unique – Carnivorous: Gain 0.5 bonus attack damage whenever you kill a minion, doubled for kills against champions, large monsters, and large minions. This effect stacks up to 40 times, for a total of 20 bonus attack damage. Lose 60% of stacks upon death.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CLEAVE: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage from abilities deal ( 40% AD /  20% AD) physical damage to other enemies within 350 units of the target damaged. Can only hit each target once per attack or ability, and may only trigger once every 10 seconds from the same cast.
